[b][color=white]Premium Tools and Programs Reduced Sticky Price[/color][/b]
The sticky price for the [url=https://hackforums.net/forumdisplay.php?fid=374]Premium Tools and Programs[/url] subforum has been reduced to $20/week or $75/mo. For those interested in purchasing a sticky, [url=https://hackforums.net/buysticky.php]click here[/url].[i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6038666] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Recent Downtime, Now Supporting Emojis! ðŸ‘·[/color][/b]
HackForums was offline for roughly 7 hours a couple days ago while a database change was done to add support for UTF8MB4 or in English... Emojis! ðŸ’¥ [i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6038176] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]/Dev/Null:Ports[/color][/b]
Prepare your buttocks for a brand new game to be released very soon (maybe even today!). Stop right now and go read all about it![i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6038065] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Support Xerotic![/color][/b]
A lot of this development we've been witnessing couldn't be done as quickly without the huge help from Xerotic so go support him on his [url=https://www.patreon.com/hf_xerotic]Patreon[/url]. Currently, Xerotic is only getting $45/mo from the members of Hack Forums - [b]that's fucking awful[/b]. I know for a fact everyone here throws away at least $5 a month on stupid useless shit. Go subscribe $5/month to Xerotic and put that wasted $5 towards good!

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Announcements[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6031574][color=#FFFFFF]Mobile Notifications[/color][/url] - Omniscient
Omniscient has got notifications working for Android users and has announced that an IOS app is in progress for everyone who is using apple phones.
[/list]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Informational Threads[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6031566][color=#FFFFFF]My city is under Cyber Attack[/color][/url] - Mystery Oreos
DigiFam has found an article called "Cyberattack launched against City of Pensacola" and it states that his home down is under a cyber attack and that no one is really safe.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6032353][color=#FFFFFF]Forum Closure[/color][/url] - Gamer
Two some what known and large forum websites have been shut down recently by zac nrw.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6032915][color=#FFFFFF]Friends Die[/color][/url] - Omniscient
Recently one of Omniscient friends has passed away. He seems to have been very touched by his buddy dying, and we all know he will be missed. Make sure you send some love over to the thread as its never easy losing someone that means so much to you.
[/list]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Entertaining Threads[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6002063][color=#FFFFFF]Why I don't have kids[/color][/url] - MavenGradle
Kids, some of us love them and some of us just don't even want them. Well to MavenGradle he believes that if you tell someone at an "older age" that you don't want kids you are a monster to them?

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6033080][color=#FFFFFF]Hackforums Rewind / Highlights 2019[/color][/url] - flavoral
flavoral has done one better than youtube this year and made a thread getting everyone to highlight moments of 2019 based around Hack Forums. Luckily we don't have a like or dislike button like youtube, otherwise, he might be getting a lot of dislikes. Make sure you share your moments on this thread to keep the rewind alive!

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6032707][color=#FFFFFF]what device do you HF on?[/color][/url] - spiral
Some of us use a laptop; some of us use a big computer and some of us will even use a mobile phone, spiral is asking everyone what they use Hack Forums on and why?

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6032788][color=#FFFFFF]FBI Now Hiring[/color][/url] - Omniscient
Omniscient was recently searching for some Swat information and came across an indeed post-hiring people for the FBI. He has stated within the thread that it's a good way to get chicks but we all know it's just for the power.
[/list]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Contests & Giveaways[/b][/color]

[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6032638][color=#FFFFFF]12K Bytes Till Christmas Giveaway ** 12 Winners!! **[/color][/url] - Wheelie
The user known as Wheelie is hosting a giveaway running until Christmas,

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6032468][color=#FFFFFF]1000 Bytes Giveaway[/color][/url] - eXceptional
If you have over 200 posts, no warning points, then go enter eXceptional's giveaway for 1,000 bytes.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6031457][color=#FFFFFF]0.002652 BTC (20$) Contest | All Members | Multiple Entries[/color][/url] - Zero
Zero is giving away $20, and everyone has a chance, the giveaway ends on the 31st of December good luck!
[/list]

 Â  Â  Â  [/size][/font]

[align=center][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v4/businessnews-bear.png[/img][/align]

[b][color=white]U.S. â€“ Mexico Customs Relations[/color][/b]
[align=justify]The US government has made progress in its attempt to strike a customs deal with its southern neighbour. Ever since President Donald Trump came to office, he has launched and sustained an intense campaign to re-shape the trade agreement between the three North American countries. The United States ambassador to Mexico, Christopher Landau, spoke after what he described as a fruitful meeting with the Mexican finance ministry. Landau reported that the US Attorney General, William Barr would visit the country in January to discuss further cooperation. He further stated that their goal is to exercise control of the border and eliminate the flow of illicit drugs, firearms, and money across the two countries' borders. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.reuters.com/article/us-usa-mexico-idUSKBN1YW01Z]>>Source[/url][/size][/i][/align]

[b][color=white]Amazon Ring Sued[/color][/b]
[align=justify]Amazon, the global e-commerce giant, has come under fire after one of its products was reportedly hacked. The product is an Amazon ring camera. Amazon acquired the ring in early, 2018. The lawsuit was filed by a parent who claimed that his ring was hacked by an unknown hacker who then proceeded to watch his three pre-adolescent children aged 7, 9 and 10 play basketball. The hacker then used the devices speaker feature to encourage the children to get closer to the camera. Such incidents of hacking are the latest in a series of events. Another pre-adolescent girl from Mississippi was also a victim. The hacker told her to he was Santa Claus and called her a racial slur. The company has, however, refused to comment on the matter. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.theguardian.com/technology/2019/dec/27/ring-camera-lawsuit-hackers-alabama]>>Source[/url][/size][/i][/align]

[b][color=white]Tim Hortonâ€™s President Steps Down[/color][/b]
[align=justify]Tim Hortons, the Canadian Fast food giant, has announced a shakeup in its top management. The company which is a dominant player in Canada it has struggled to gain a global foothold has announced that President Mr Alex Macedo will leave the company. Axel Schwan will now oversee the Canadian, American and Latin American markets as well. The company has been struggling to grow sales in a very competitive fast-food market. The fast-food market is entering a new exciting phase. Developments such as the phenomenal success of Popeye's chicken sandwich, which sold out in minutes will potentially shake up the industry.  [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.foxbusiness.com/business-leaders/tim-hortons-president-alex-macedo-to-leave-next-year]>>Source[/url][/size][/i][/align]

[color=transparent]    [/color]

[align=center][img]https://www.hackforums.news/assets/v4/technews-invisible.png[/img][/align]

[b][color=white]AI Smart Fridges[/color][/b]
Samsung and LG are going head-to-head again, offering their smart fridges with artificial intelligence capabilities. These latest smart fridges from both companiesâ€™ will be unveiled at this yearâ€™s CES 2020. The selling point behind this will be cameras installed inside the refrigerator. They will be able to â€œscan whatâ€™s inside and let users know what items theyâ€™re short on, even making meal suggestions based on the ingredients they still have.â€ One question that stands out â€“ can ingredients be recognized in Tupperware, or how well can ingredients be known? Prices are not yet available, but selling between $4,500 and $6,000 is projected for both companies.[i][size=x-small][url=https://www.theverge.com/2020/1/2/21046822/samsung-lg-smart-fridge-family-hub-instaview-thinq-ai-ces-2020] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]AI Detecting Breast Cancer[/color][/b]
Google has shown that when looking for breast cancer, an artificial intelligence program they have built will outperform doctors. The program took the United Kingdom and the United States mammograms and used this data for training. A recent study showed that the program had fewer false positives and false negatives than a human expert. The findings are as followed â€œCompared to human experts; the program reduced false positives by 5.7% for US subjects and 1.2% for UK subjects. It reduced false negatives by 9.4% for US subjects and 2.7% for UK subjects.â€ Such results showed that often, the program was able to detect breast cancer with less data than humans did.[i][size=x-small][url=https://www.cnn.com/2020/01/02/tech/google-health-breast-cancer/index.html] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Ransomware Strikes Again[/color][/b]
For more than 30 hours, the USCG (United States Coast Guard) has reported, a ransomware attack took US maritime base offline. An employee is believed to have clicked on a link in an email containing the ransomware responsible for â€œinterrupted cameras, door access control systems, and critical monitoring systems at the site.â€ The identity or location exposed to the ransomware was not disclosed to the public. In 2019, Ransomware wreaked havoc with many businesses and governments causing an abused amount of money to be spent on recovering systems, while the hackers demanded money.[i][size=x-small][url=https://www.bbc.com/news/technology-50972890] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]AT&T 5G Expansion[/color][/b]
As more and more carriers try to expand their coverage further than their other rivals, 5G has been a hot topic in recent months. AT&T has extended its footprint with its low-band network to nine new markets over the past few weeks. It covers â€œNew York City, Buffalo, Chicago, Philadelphia, Baltimore, Washington, D.C., Las Vegas, Louisville, and Bridgeport, CT.â€ But with this recent expansion, as any new technology enters the market, there are some disadvantages. This move will use a 5G low band, which is an 850 Mhz spectrum, covering a larger area than the 5G millimeter wave with a higher frequency resulting in faster speeds.[i][size=x-small][url=https://www.cnet.com/news/at-t-bolsters-5g-network-with-new-low-band-and-millimeter-wave-cities/] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]'Hacker' Avoids Jail Time[/color][/b]
22-year-old Kerem Albayrak has avoided jail time after admitting to blackmailing Apple that "he had access to millions of iCloud accounts.â€ In March 2017, Albayrak contacted Apple stating that he â€˜hackedâ€™ into millions of iCloud accounts and was demanding $100,000 of crypto-currency, or he would dump all the accounts online. Shortly after Apple was aware of the situation, they found no evidence of any breaches and Albayrak was arrested. UKâ€™s NCA (National Crime Agency) stated that Albayrak found previous dumps of iCloud email addresses and passwords, then took this data and was able to gain access to two accounts, thinking he could get away with it. He will be working 300 hours of unpaid work and has been put under six months of electronic curfew.[i][size=x-small][url=https://www.bbc.com/news/technology-50924434] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Amazon Biometrics[/color][/b]
Amazon is looking at a new way of identifying customers shopping at Amazon Go stores. The tech giant has recently filed for a patent using technology to recognize you in the palm of your hand by your veins and wrinkles. This system would first come to Whole Foods first and then spread to their Amazon Go stores. But it was proposed that this technology should be tested at their Amazon Go stores first by the U.S. Patent and Trademark Office. If such technology Is adopted and pushed to market, it will provide more data on customers to companies like Amazon.[i][size=x-small][url=https://www.usatoday.com/story/tech/2019/12/27/amazon-wants-patent-tech-uses-veins-your-hands-id-you/2755279001/] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]       [/color]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2605759][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v4/animenews-houtarou.png[/img][/url][/align]

[b][color=white]Three New Manga to Launch in Shonen Jump in Early 2020[/color][/b]
The most recent combined issue of Shueisha's Weekly Shonen Jump magazine revealed that Yoshifumi Totsuka, Hajime Komoto, and Asahi Sakano will all launch new manga series in the magazine in early 2020. Totsuka's [i]Undead Unluck[/i] series of "picaresque heroes" will center on an unlucky girl, and will premiere on January 20th. The first chapter will be 54 pages long and feature color opening pages. Komoto will launch their new series [i]MASHLE[/i] the following week on January 27th. Asahi will launch [i]Majo no Moribito (The Witch's Guardian)[/i] in the 10th issue on February 3rd.[i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2020-01-03/3-new-manga-launch-in-shonen-jump-in-early-2020/.154899]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Hatsune Miku, Kyary Pamyu Pamyu to Perform at Coachella[/color][/b]
Music festival Coachella finally announced their full artist lineup for 2020, which includes Japanese talents Hatsune Miku and Kyary Pamyu Pamyu. Vocaloid icon Hatsune Miku is slated to perform on April 10th and 17th, while singer Kyary Pamyu Pamyu will perform on April 12th and 19th. According to Coachella's website, first weekend sales are already sold out, but presales for the second weekend will open on January 6th.[i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/interest/2020-01-03/hatsune-miku-kyary-pamyu-pamyu-to-perform-at-coachella/.155010]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Studio Ghibli's New Yearâ€™s Greeting Mentions 2nd Film in Production[/color][/b]
Many companies in Japan post greetings over the New Year's, called Nenga, to give thanks for support and to let their clients know about current ongoings. Studio Ghibli did the same on their website, giving an overview of previously-announced Studio Ghibli theme park, and Hayao Miyazaki's [i]How Do You Live?[/i] Film production. But in addition to these, they also snuck in a mention for another film that has never before been spoken about. Seeing as they only gave this project a small nod, we still don't know what it is, or whether it will be animated, live-action, feature-length, or something else entirely.[i][size=x-small][url=https://www.crunchyroll.com/anime-news/2020/01/01-1/studio-ghibli-posts-new-years-greeting-with-mention-of-2nd-film-in-production]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]   [/color][/size][/font]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2890436][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v4/vibes-pikachu.png[/img][/url][/align]

[b][color=#ccffff]Horoscopes[/color][/b] / [i]Jan 6, 2020 - Jan 12, 2020[/i]
[list]
[*][b][color=#cc3333]Aries â™ˆ[/color][/b]
[i]"While fiery Mars continues its journey through your travel zone, a desire to get away from it all could increase. Still, this week may bring other concerns into the mix as a potent lineup of planets in your sector of goals and ambitions is very much to the fore.

With a lunar eclipse in Cancer on Friday acting as a catalyst, the coming days could bring a key issue to a head. And the outcome can vary depending on how youâ€™ve handled your responsibilities and whether youâ€™re doing what you want to do.

If youâ€™re happy with your current path, you may get a promotion or find your image or reputation enhanced. Or, if youâ€™ve ignored feelings of discontent and stuck to the tried and trusted, you could be facing a reality check. The cosmos could encourage an ending so that you can get involved in whatever is your passion."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=1]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#ff99ff]Taurus â™‰[/color][/b]
[i]"As the first week of 2020 gets underway, it comes with a powerful gift from the cosmos. Thereâ€™s a major focus on your sector of growth and travel, so you might have to let go of the old to embrace the new.

Are you eager to explore new opportunities? You might need to expand your beliefs in order to leave your comfort zone. This is a time when you may become aware of old patterns and ways of thinking that have discouraged you from exploring your true potential.

This weekâ€™s powerful lunar eclipse in your communication zone encourages you to take the initiative and connect with a life coach or teacher who can help you move beyond your limits. With cautious Saturn linking to powerful Pluto, this can be a time of stripping back whatever no longer serves you, including outdated thinking. What follows could be the start of a whole new and very exciting phase."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=2]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#66cc33]Gemini â™Š[/color][/b]
[i]"Although Mars in your sector of relating can increase the pace of key interactions and enhance your social life, your focus may be on more pressing issues. With a lunar eclipse across your financial axis, and an intense Saturn-Pluto connection linking with other key planets, money matters could be very much to the fore.

You may be questioning your self-worth, as well as the value you give to the things and people in your life, including money. This dynamic focus can bring you face-to-face with your defense mechanisms. If youâ€™ve resisted getting to the core of any money issues, itâ€™s time to dive in and find out more. You might also find that the real reason has nothing to do with money and everything to do with blocked emotions. If you can gently process through this, greater abundance may be yours.

On a lighter note, the presence of sweet Venus in your travel sector could see you relishing a relaxing break if you can take one."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=3]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#3399ff]Cancer â™‹[/color][/b]
[i]"Relationships are very much to the fore this week and for some time to come. But this week is particularly special in that it sees a rare connection between prudent Saturn and volcanic Pluto in your relationship zone.

What does this mean for you? It suggests that a key bond could come to a natural end, and that it might be time to turn over a new leaf. Itâ€™s also possible that a relationship could move to a new level of trust after a period of reflection, and that what follows may be on a far deeper level than ever.

With a lunar eclipse in your sign on Friday followed by a powerful Saturn-Pluto conjunction over the weekend, this can be an intense few days. Emotions may reach a peak, so itâ€™s probably wise to leave any key decisions until the following week when things are more settled."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=4]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#ff9933]Leo â™Œ[/color][/b]
[i]"Your relationship to your work and health could be held up to the light this week, with key influences encouraging a process of change. If youâ€™ve felt suffocated by your job, this could be a time when you feel ready to try something new. Itâ€™s also possible that a job could come to an end, and this might inspire you to look for something that engages more of your natural skills and abilities.

Fridayâ€™s lunar eclipse can highlight areas that are causing you stress, and it is these that youâ€™ll want to look at. As taskmaster Saturn aligns with power-broker Pluto over the weekend, itâ€™s an opportunity to cut out any deadwood from your life so that new shoots can begin to develop.

And with electric Uranus turning direct in your career zone, positive change may be coming your way."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=5]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#339933]Virgo â™[/color][/b]
[i]"As dynamic Mars journeys through your domestic sector, itâ€™s a great opportunity for some decluttering. In fact, this week can be a time of clearing out and paring things back to the essentials. With a powerful lunar eclipse across your social axis, and a transformative Saturn-Pluto merger in your creative zone, you could be on the verge of a powerful shift.

Where are you not being true to yourself? The answer could be revealing. This weekâ€™s alignment encourages you to accept yourself, warts and all, because by doing so it will be easier to express your unique purpose. Want to be an artist, craftsperson, musician, or anything else? Itâ€™s time to drop the mask and show the world who you really are.

In addition, you might have the option of collaborating with someone this week or find that a romance begins to take shape. Go easy, though, and take your time to build this relationship. Thereâ€™s no hurry."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=6]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#3366ff]Libra â™Ž[/color][/b]
[i]"Your domestic zone takes center stage this week with a powerful lineup here. It can mean that an issue that has been ongoing comes to a head, yet this is likely no surprise. And with sobering Saturn linking to powerful Pluto, this may be a time of discovery that enables you to understand something about your history or heritage that proves empowering.

With a lunar eclipse in your sector of career on Friday, feelings about your work/life balance could also be particularly strong. You might be ready for a change, but it would be unwise to make any snap decisions. If, however, one job comes to an end, something much better and more suited to you could take its place.

As this is likely to be a very emotionally intense week, be sure to look after yourself and get the necessary nurturing and self-care. Donâ€™t push yourself. If you feel like you need a break, take one."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=7]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#8B0000]Scorpio â™[/color][/b]
[i]"Your words might have more power than usual, so it would be wise to be careful about what you say. The intense focus on your sector of communication can be a call to change your mindset, particularly if negative thinking has held you back.

With a potent lunar eclipse across your communication access and a transformative Saturn-Pluto merger, it would be unwise to make promises that you canâ€™t keep. Itâ€™s also a good idea to be very careful when it comes to signing important documents or committing to anything major. Make sure that you arenâ€™t tied to something that doesnâ€™t work in your best interests.

At the same time, the presence of dynamic Mars in your money zone could inspire you to sort out any lingering financial issues. And with electric Uranus turning direct in your home zone, you can now take concrete steps to make the changes you have envisioned."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=8]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#FFFF00]Sagittarius â™[/color][/b]
[i]"Finances could keep you on your toes over this week because the focus is very much on this sector. Issues of self-worth may come to the surface, and if so, this can give you much food for thought. If youâ€™ve had difficulties with money matters, it could be that deep down you donâ€™t value yourself enough.

This week, a powerful Saturn-Pluto merger in this zone could inspire you to do something about this. Working with a life coach or perhaps trying energy healing or EFT tapping can help shift those blocks and get you on the road to success.

Having feisty Mars in your sign can help, too, because it can give you the confidence and courage to make a bold move. If youâ€™ve doubted yourself, then the presence of the red planet can fill you with determination and an ability to leave your comfort zone."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=9]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#663333]Capricorn â™‘[/color][/b]
[i]"You may need to face certain truths this week as sobering Saturn and dynamic Pluto merge in your sign. This can be a time of paring back your goals and ambitions and simplifying them as much as you can. If youâ€™ve taken on too much, you might have felt the pressure for too long now, and events this week can push you do something about it. With dwarf planet Ceres involved in the mix, finding a level of activity that inspires and nurtures you can be the key to happiness.

In addition, the lunar eclipse across your relationship axis could see you questioning a key bond. This can be an opportunity to clear the air by talking things over. Just avoid overreacting or doing or saying anything that you might come to regret later.

With powerful Mars in your spiritual sector, you may find that taking up a practice such as yoga or qigong can help bring a sense of inner peace."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=10]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#9966ff]Aquarius â™’[/color][/b]
[i]"You may have been working on your inner game for some time now, and this week things reach a new and empowering stage. The potent blend of prudent Saturn and transformative Pluto can help you uncover your true purpose, making this a very powerful time for you.

To do so, you might need to find closure on issues that have kept you hobbled for too long. And with a lunar eclipse in the cards, as well as a potent lineup, it could be essential to get help. Doing it alone might not be an option. This can be deep-seated stuff, and getting professional help could allow you to make a major shift that feels like a rebirth.

Such a major change can have an impact on your values and self-worth in a positive way. Once you know who you are and what youâ€™re capable of, nothing will be able to hold you back."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=11]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#cccc66]Pisces â™“[/color][/b]
[i]"Get ready for a shift in your social scene, because powerful influences and aspects this week could change everything. You already have expansive Jupiter moving through this sector opening doors and bringing fresh possibilities your way.

This week could see you letting go of so-called â€œfriendsâ€ who may not be doing you any favors. And if youâ€™ve been involved in any toxic associations, you might be ready to jettison these as well.

You may be looking for your true tribe of people who nurture you, support your dreams, and keep you feeling good. They are out there, and you may be closer to finding them than ever, if you havenâ€™t found them already.

At the same time, you may decide to put energy into your career and professional goals as dynamic Mars continues its journey through your career sector. This could see you pushing ahead and eager to make progress. Before you get too involved, though, it might be a good idea to step back and assess your priorities."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=12]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]
[/list]

[b][color=white]The New Year of 2020[/color][/b]

[i]I hope everybody had a great holiday season! Here we are in the new year of 2020. There is already a lot going on this year but lets not let these things discourage us. Be strong, and be ready for whatever lies ahead. This is the year where we will truly be put to the test. Be strong and lets ride out this new year strong! May your spirit guide you through all the obstacles that lie ahead. [/i]
